    • composeComment

      public static String composeComment(List<QueryOptimizer> queryOptimizers)
      Compose a single-line comment to describe all query optimizers in the list Example: "/* SET LOCAL enable_hashjoin = off */ /* SET LOCAL enable_mergejoin = off */"
      Parameters:
      queryOptimizers - - A list of QueryOptimizer objects
      Returns:
      a single-line string that contains a comment for each query optimizer used

    • insertQueryOptimizerCommentToSelectQueryString

      public static String insertQueryOptimizerCommentToSelectQueryString(List<QueryOptimizer> queryOptimizers, String selectSqlString)
      Insert all query optimizers comment after the SELECT keyword of a select SQL query
      Parameters:
      queryOptimizers - - a list of QueryOptimizers
      selectSqlString - - a select SQL query string
      Returns:
      the same select SQL query string with the query optimizers comment inserted after the SELECT keyword. If a select SQL query is not detected, the original query string would be returned.
